Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0475 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.8.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-0475 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.8.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package packer is earlier than 1.8.7-1, affected by CVE-2023-0475
